showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ Showers out of question!  There is a guy at the front desk he ask for your nr to call  you when shower ready. He will never call you. PILOT/FLYING J MANAGEMENT are you gone due something???? Horrible place üò°üò°üò°..... ‚Ä¶
Pilot sucks this place is outdated just by displaying pilot doesn‚Äôt make difference had to wait long for shower

They would not let me pay for a shower because I don't have a cdl I even explained I drove 30 minutes out of the way to get there while working in the area for a month. They should be letting all the homeless out front get free showers

This place really hooked me up. I was also able to take a shower and they let my dog in the bathroom with me So she would not be hot out in my van. The lady share we're all great not to mention very beautiful, It must be a pretty requisite ‚Ä¶

This was our first time coming here and we were not disappointed. After a long day of driving, we were looking for a place to park, fuel, shower and eat‚Ä¶they provided all 4. It‚Äôs a smaller parking lot with a few free and a couple reserved ‚Ä¶
Place is definitely not convenient only cdl drivers allowed to shower but when you come put here to help restore their power . DEFINITELY DONT STOP RUDE STAFF AND THE WEBSITE LIES

If you arrive early enough in the day there is parking. I don't recommend the showers. They are dirty. There was hair all over the place in there! Yuck! ü§Æ I took a shower anyways, I was dirty and needed a shower. I got subway, it was good. ‚Ä¶

Drove 40 minutes out of my way to take a shower only to be told only truckers with reward cards can use them. Would have literally paid $30 to take a shower but they gave no option. Also, the bathroom was disgusting so maybe I dodged a ‚Ä¶

They don't speak English very well. We asked for a shower and was told it's only for truck drivers, we are truck drivers and have unlimited showers. No drivers lounge and only 2 showers outside. Showers close at 10pm so don't expect a late ‚Ä¶

What a joke for a truckstop!  No showers after 10 pm until 7 am.  We came in at 8 and they because of the line, we couldn't get a shower.  Nice way to treat the drivers who come to a Pilot expecting decent service.  Never again!
